revised_title: A Case Study of a Boy Passing Stones and the Possible Causes
tldr: A boy passed a large number of stones through his urinary system, with some stones being triangular in shape and varying in color and size. The author suggests that the boy's diet, which included sand mixed with sand eels, and a head injury may have contributed to the formation and passing of these stones. The case study also includes other examples of individuals who experienced similar stone passing and recovery.
